original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4667.
    Returns: the length of each of the equal pieces in millimeters.
    """
    # L1
    total_rope_length_cm = 1165 # A 1165 cm long rope
    mm_per_cm = 10 # WK
    total_rope_length_mm = total_rope_length_cm * mm_per_cm

    # L2
    total_pieces = 154 # cut into 154 pieces
    equal_pieces_count = 150 # 150 of the pieces are equally sized
    unequal_pieces_count = total_pieces - equal_pieces_count

    # L3
    length_of_unequal_piece_mm = 100 # the remaining pieces are 100mm each
    total_length_of_unequal_pieces = unequal_pieces_count * length_of_unequal_piece_mm

    # L4
    remaining_length_for_equal_pieces = total_rope_length_mm - total_length_of_unequal_pieces

    # L5
    length_of_each_equal_piece_mm = remaining_length_for_equal_pieces / equal_pieces_count

    # FA
    answer = length_of_each_equal_piece_mm
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: {total_pieces}-{equal_pieces_count} = <<{total_pieces}-{equal_pieces_count}={unequal_pieces_count}>>{unequal_pieces_count} pieces of the rope are {length_of_unequal_piece_mm}mm each in length

The {unequal_pieces_count} pieces have a total length of {unequal_pieces_count}*{length_of_unequal_piece_mm} = <<{unequal_pieces_count}*{length_of_unequal_piece_mm}={total_length_of_unequal_pieces}>>{total_length_of_unequal_pieces}mm

There is a length of {total_rope_length_mm}-{total_length_of_unequal_pieces} = <<{total_rope_length_mm}-{total_length_of_unequal_pieces}={remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}>>{remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}mm left

{remaining_length_for_equal_pieces} mm into {equal_pieces_count} equal pieces will give each piece as {remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}/{equal_pieces_count} = <<{remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}/{equal_pieces_count}={length_of_each_equal_piece_mm}>>{length_of_each_equal_piece_mm}mm long
